title: Hamarhraft
content:
Hamarhraft Uncommon 2~12 Damage 2d6Bludgeoning Shockwave: When the wearer jumps, they deal 1d4 Thunder damage in a 3m radius upon landing. Main Hand OnlyTenacity: When you miss an attack, you deal Bludgeoning damage anyway. Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks: The dwarven grammar is garbled, but the weapon's name suggests something about the importance of first impressions. MaulTwo-Handed 4.5 65

Shockwave: When the wearer jumps, they deal 1d4 Thunder damage in a 3m radius upon landing.

M
